thread.title: Prince Harry and Meghan snap up wedding photographer

title: Prince Harry and Meghan snap up wedding photographer
text:
April 13, 2018 / 2:28 PM / Updated 2 hours ago Prince Harry and Meghan snap up wedding photographer Reuters Staff 1   Britain’s Prince Harry and his American fiancée Meghan Markle have chosen New York-based fashion photographer Alexi Lubomirski as the photographer for their wedding next month, the prince’s office said on Friday. One of two official engagement photos released by Kensington Palace of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle, at Frogmore House in Windsor, Britain December 21, 2017. Picture taken in the week commencing December 17, 2017. Alexi Lubomirski/Courtesy Of Kensington Palace/Handout via REUTERS 
Lubomirski also did the couple’s engagement photos, and he is a former assistant to Mario Testino, who was famed for his photos of Harry’s late mother Princess Diana. 
“I could not be more thrilled or honoured to photograph this historic occasion,” Lubomirski   “Having taken Prince Harry and Ms. Markle’s engagement photos, it brings me such joy to be able to witness again, the next chapter in this wonderful love story.” 
Queen Elizabeth’s 33-year-old grandson, Harry, fifth-in-line to the throne, and Markle, 36, who starred in the U.S. TV legal drama “Suits”, will marry in Windsor on May 19. Reporting by Alistair Smout; editing by Michael Holden
